title: An interesting thought
body:
Hello Summoners, 

With the release of the new champion  Ekko, i began to think will there ever be a 4th ban for each team in draft pick? If you think about it, with riot releasing new champions every now and then, eventually the champion pool will become big enough that 3 bans each still leaves potentially a lot of valuable champions open. 

Just an interesting thought

replies.body: Lol *cancer* get the fuck out xD

we need 5 bans, 1 for each person.
can't ban all that cancer with only 6 bans, and 3 of them i can't decide anyway
You can pick 5 champions each team anyway.

> [{quoted}](name=FromLanXiang,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=c7t4rjLm,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-11T05:09:42.805+0000)
>
> You can pick 5 champions each team anyway.

But more champs also means more pesky individuals or combos people might not want to deal with, hence I don't think adding an extra ban slot or 2 for both teams now is being unreasonable.

Nowadays there are just not enough bans.

Pretty much what Sekai said, fact is in professional games (LCS etc.) you'll find that they have a lot of trouble doing bans that in any way actually affect the other team.

However the opposite is true, lets say you give 5 bans, now there is 10 champions banned away, that can really screw people not only on a professional level, but in lower ranked as well (it also means you require 20 champions)
The topic comes up every few champion releases. So far Riot hasn't hinted at any increase in the ban numbers for Draft.
